text: Osvaldo Héctor Cruz (29 May 1931 – 20 March 2023) was an Argentine footballer. He was born in Buenos Aires. He played for clubs in Argentina, Brazil and Chile. He played for the Argentina national football team in the FIFA World Cup in Sweden in 1958. Cruz died on 20 March 2023, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at BDFA Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires
title: Osvaldo Héctor Cruz
